titleproper.value: Guide to the Spanish Civil War Letters <num>ALBA.308</num>

publisher.value: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

addressline: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2019-03-08T22:34:15</date>

corpname.value: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

abstract.value: This collection of Spanish Civil War Letters documents events and activities that occurred prior to and post war from 1929 to 1944. The collection is comprised of correspondence in both letter and postcard formats. The handwritten letters are from different participants and times during the war, and include written communication between soldiers and their family members; government officials; prisoners of war; and others. This collection documents particular activities of the Spanish Civil War from the personal perspectives of these individuals.

p.value: Identification of item, date; Spanish Civil War Letters; ALBA 308; box number; folder number or item identifier; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

Materials were purchased from Kevin Jackson in 2015; there is no previous documentation concerning the provenance of these materials before they came into the vendor's possession. The accession number associated with this purchase is 2019.022.

This collection of Spanish Civil War Letters consists of correspondence in both letter and postcard formats. The handwritten letters are from different participants and times during the war, and include written communication between soldiers and their family members; government officials; prisoners of war; and others. This collection documents particular activities of the Spanish Civil War from the personal perspectives of these individuals.

corpname.value: Unión General de Trabajadores de España
